commit.message:
Add support for image links and data URIs for notebooks (#724)

* ENH Add support for image links and data URIs for notebooks

Currently, when notebooks are generated, the links to images found in
rST remain unmodified, meaning images expected to be either local or
found on web server hosting documentation are broken.

This change allows inclusion of images via data URIs, or prefixing the
image links in the notebooks, for example to server hosting
documentation.

This also changes the markdown output to use HTML `img` tag, and such
also supports the width and height options.

* Improve documentation/comments for notebook images feature

* Parametrize notebook image tests and separate data uri test

* Revert docstring change and fix test names

[ci skip]

* Update documentation for notebook images

* Change Warning to ExtensionError for notebook images

This applies to when data URI's are being generated, and file is missing
and such unable to produce URI.

verification.payload:
tree fc3f182658fb45793c7c911d8dd2fbe082667ad4
parent 358c4c02834bc307d935db608aee0ad2a9300526
author Steven Hiscocks <sdhiscocks@dstl.gov.uk> 1595355464 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1595355464 -0400

Add support for image links and data URIs for notebooks (#724)

* ENH Add support for image links and data URIs for notebooks

Currently, when notebooks are generated, the links to images found in
rST remain unmodified, meaning images expected to be either local or
found on web server hosting documentation are broken.

This change allows inclusion of images via data URIs, or prefixing the
image links in the notebooks, for example to server hosting
documentation.

This also changes the markdown output to use HTML `img` tag, and such
also supports the width and height options.

* Improve documentation/comments for notebook images feature

* Parametrize notebook image tests and separate data uri test

* Revert docstring change and fix test names

[ci skip]

* Update documentation for notebook images

* Change Warning to ExtensionError for notebook images

This applies to when data URI's are being generated, and file is missing
and such unable to produce URI.

commit.message:
Make md5 hash independent of platform line endings (#722)

* Make md5 hash independent of platform line endings

Currently md5 hash for Python files depends on what platform file is on,
as file endings will differ. This change reads the Python files in the
hashing function with universal line endings, such md5 is independent of
platform being used.

Surrogate escapes are used, to ensure that it can handle any errors
without data loss.

This is useful when adding a complex or long running examples into a
repository that may be used across platforms.

* Add test for md5 hash file.

* Add binary/text mode for md5sum functions

This ensures consisted md5sum for text files e.g. Python files, and
IPython Notebooks; but valid md5sums for binary files.

* Use text mode for md5sum with backreference files

verification.payload:
tree b00a6cb3aa91a39559e7e55544bfccd9176cffea
parent 3381f7ad94c36f600551673e779c3ff58f5abc32
author Steven Hiscocks <sdhiscocks@dstl.gov.uk> 1594138315 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1594138315 -0400

Make md5 hash independent of platform line endings (#722)

* Make md5 hash independent of platform line endings

Currently md5 hash for Python files depends on what platform file is on,
as file endings will differ. This change reads the Python files in the
hashing function with universal line endings, such md5 is independent of
platform being used.

Surrogate escapes are used, to ensure that it can handle any errors
without data loss.

This is useful when adding a complex or long running examples into a
repository that may be used across platforms.

* Add test for md5 hash file.

* Add binary/text mode for md5sum functions

This ensures consisted md5sum for text files e.g. Python files, and
IPython Notebooks; but valid md5sums for binary files.

* Use text mode for md5sum with backreference files

commit.message:
Support headings in RST to MD (#723)

* ENH Support headings in RST to MD

This enables support for converting headings from RST into Markdown text
for Jupyter Notebooks, with heading levels maintained for entire
notebook.

* RST to MD handle centered headings and white space on preceding line

* Fix flake8 issue in notebook

* Minor docstring fix.

[ci skip]

Co-authored-by: Lucy Liu <jliu176@gmail.com>

* Minor comment spelling correction

[ci skip]

Co-authored-by: Lucy Liu <jliu176@gmail.com>

[ci skip]

Co-authored-by: Lucy Liu <jliu176@gmail.com>

commit.message:
Enable html to be rendered on readthedocs (#700)

* Enable html to be rendered on readthedocs

Per comment: https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/issues/4765#issuecomment-431927720

* Remove `only` directive for raw html

The `raw` directive already covers the case for non-html builders to
ignore raw html block

* Fix tests for raw html in gen_rst
